description: Chikage is the beast of Ayane. He sometimes appears in the shape of a human. Unlike the other beasts, Chikage has grown too large to leave the mansion, also limiting Ayane`s capability of traveling. As Chikage is very protective of Ayane due to her health, he needs some time to be persuaded by Shino to have the foxes accompany her outside.
name: Chikage
